Title: Comments on a Blockchain-Enabled Privacy-Preserving Scheme for Demand-Response Management in Smart Grid Environments
abstract: To protect privacy, Park et al. proposed a blockchain-enabled privacy-preserving scheme (BPPS) to achieve demand response in the smart grid environment. Park et al. claimed that their scheme could resist various attacks and ensure both of privacy and data integrity. However, with thorough analysis of their scheme, we find that it suffers from three flaws.

Published in.name: 2024 10th International Conference on Applied System Innovation (ICASI)

Authors.name: Ya-Fen Chang
